desc: Repainting worn-out railings helps improve public spaces by enhancing both safety and aesthetics. This project aimed to refresh the environment, demonstrating how small acts of care can contribute to a cleaner and more welcoming community.

Donating essential items to an orphanage helps support the daily needs and development of children. Contributions like food, clothes, and supplies can make a meaningful difference in improving their quality of life and well-being.

Planting trees is vital for the environment. They absorb carbon dioxide, produce oxygen, and provide habitats for wildlife. Trees also help prevent soil erosion and improve air quality. By planting trees, we contribute to a healthier planet and combat climate change.
